title: Topic 004 Question 062
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains a resource group named RG1 and a virtual network named VNet1.
You need to deploy Azure Firewall to RG1. The solution must minimize administrative effort.
options: Create a secured virtual hub named AzureFirewallHub.
Create a new virtual network named AzureFirewallNetwork.
Create a new resource group named AzurFirewellRescurceGroup.
On VNet1, create virtual subnet named AzureFirewallSubnet
